duties_responsibilities.duty: Serve as the primary point of contact with CROs and assist in the development and validation of programming specs, SDTM mapping specs, and ADaM specs.
Work cross-functionally with Clinical Affairs, Clin Ops, and Data Management teams to support data analysis and reporting for all clinical trial and submission work.
Support data analysis and reporting for all clinical trial and submission work.
Assist in the development and validation of programming specs, SDTM mapping specs, and ADaM specs.

education_certification.credential: Ph.D. with 2+ years, MS with 6+, BS with 8+ years of programming experience in the biopharmaceutical industry
Bachelor’s degree in statistics, computer science, mathematics, engineering, or life science preferred.
Must be a US Citizen or Green Card Holder
